name: Dungeons & Dragons Tactics
description:
The Ultimate Handheld RPG

Experience all the adventure, strategy, depth and excitement of of Dungeons & Dragons wherever you go

ↂ Over 40 Hours of play in 30+ levels and side quests
ↂ Wage intense strategic battles against a huge variety of D&D monsters
ↂ Adventure wit up to 3 friends via wireless multiplayer
